item.description:
Join us in a celebration of autumn on Lake Aziscohos, Maine. Camping, water sports, and German style food and beverage. Everyone bring a dish from Wursts, Golash soup, Saurbraten, breads, cheeses, Beer, cider, wine, to apple Strudel. Surprise us!

Tent space is limited. Stay overnight or come for the day or Sunday. A super place for fishing for trout and salmon- you must have a Maine fishing license.



Make your plans in advanced. There is no internet or cell phone service after the NH state line on hwy 16. Share the long ride with others to insure that you will arrive. Parking is limited.

No Maybe's for this event since space is limited. sign up when you are sure that you will be coming.


USE THE INSTRUCTIONS HERE! MAPQUEST IS NOT ACCURATE! The Lakehouse is 11 miles in on the logging road from Highway 16. follow the markers set up for this event and print out the directions. try to come before dark- this is a loooooong dark road with no signs.

Take 93 North to exit 35 onto Rt. 3, Go through Lancaster to Rt. 110 in Stark. Take Rt. 110A to Rt.16 North. Stay on Rt. 16 to Errol. In Errol you will take a left (still on Rt. 16) and head towards Rangeley, Maine. We are about 18 miles from Errol. Black Brook Cove Campground sign is on the right side of the road. Take a left turn onto the Lincoln Pond Road, take Lincoln Pond rd 4.7 miles to a split in the road bear left 7 MILES to the T and make a right TO THE ALCO flats. house is less than a mile on the left. watch for tents and signs.

Gear list: Your sleeping gear, binoculars, hiking gear.sunblock, swimsuit, towel, optional mountain bike, Maine fishing license available at the Cove campground, beverages, veggies/ protein or marshmallows for grilling. Bugs should be done for the season, and brave swimmers would be advised to pack earplugs to limit earaches.

Her camp provides coffee/tea, lighting, fishing tackle and bait, refrigeration and cooking appliances for meals, and limited bed space on a half acre. No electricity or running water. Fire wood and grilling equipment, bottled water helpful

There is space for about 6 tents outside. I have a fishing boat for anyone interested in a boat tour of the 14 mile waters in the front yard.
item.name: Oktoberfest on the Lake
